channel.title: A range dupe you may need help with
channel.description:
Hello,
Before i start this is not a request.
People who use delta and know that there is a range dupe. The where you logout and the person will disconnect.
Well anyway if you have fixed this by adding the combat timer under (UseBow) then you may encouter a problem with range following(if you have range following added, or if you removed it because of this fix for the range dupe) when your in the wilderness areas.
If you need a quick fix please post "support" and i will release it.
Im doing this because i dont want to release as a tutorial seeing as its not a tutorial, and i would get flammed and it would probally be locked because its not a hard fix but takes time to find the place for the fix.
If you guys would like the fix please post and i will happily add it to tutorials.
Thank you for reading.

item.title: A range dupe you may need help with

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Just go ahead and make the thread, you don’t need other members’ consent to do so.

Read full topic
